DOCUMENT ()
  BEGIN_REGION (>>>DOCUMENT)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (####################)
  title (title:: Glossary Ele)
    string (title:: Glossary Ele)
  id (id:: td-000013)
    string (id:: td-000013)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (####################)
  PARAGRAPH (This SML document co)
    string (This SML document co)
  PARAGRAPH (The term defined in )
    string (The term defined in )
    GLOSS_TERM_REF ()
    string (.)
  glossary (glossary:: special f)
    string (glossary:: special f)
  END_REGION (<<<DOCUMENT)
